location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 4535/1928 Pt 11 ‘Persia: Anglo-Persian Negotiations 1928-9. Policy of H. M. G.’

mods.abstract: This part contains correspondence and other papers concerning the policy of HM Government in the Persian Gulf, in relation to negotiations between the British and Persian [Iranian] Governments for a general treaty.The main correspondents are as follows: the India Office; the Government of India Foreign and Political Department; the Foreign Office; and the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf.This part also includes internal India Office correspondence, and papers of the Committee of Imperial Defence Persian Gulf Sub-Committee.
